alert.note: Alert for Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 25 at 1:47PM MST until January 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow has moved out of the area, hence have cancelled the advisory. Periods of light snow showers will persist over the next day. For the Winter Storm Watch... Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Southern Rosebud. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult Friday into Saturday with roads becoming snow packed and with poor visibility in snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
